cards.name: Energy Recycler
text: Shuffle 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Forest of Giant Plants
text: Each player's Grass Pokémon can evolve during his or her first turn or the turn he or she plays those Pokémon.

cards.name: Level Ball
text: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

ability.name: Irritating Pollen
ability.text: Each player can't play any Item cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bail Out
attacks.text: Put 2 Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Prize Count
attacks.text: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

ability.name: Flare Effect
ability.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a Fire Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

ability.name: Aqua Effect
ability.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a Water Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

attacks.name: Exavolt
attacks.text: You may do 50 more damage and leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed. If you do, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

cards.name: M Ampharos-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

ability.name: Farewell Letter
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard this Pokémon and all cards attached to it (this does not count as a Knock Out). If you do, draw a card.

ability.name: Scoundrel Ring
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon-EX (except for Hoopa-EX), reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hyperspace Fury
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: Hoopa-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Landslide
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Unyielding Rock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Break Ground
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: Tyranitar-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Destroyer King
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: M Tyranitar-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to it.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Bewitching Eyes
attacks.text: Choose a Supporter card from your opponent's discard pile and use it as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Furtive Drop
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Machine Gun Stomp
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Metagross
text: This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to it.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Forbidden Iron Hammer
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.

ability.name: Bright Heal
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Windy Mischief
attacks.text: Move all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Renegade Pulse
ability.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Mega Evolution Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chaos Wheel
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon Tool, Special Energy, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

cards.name: Giratina-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Data Check
attacks.text: Look through your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Cyber Crush
attacks.text: Discard all Special Energy attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slowing Beam
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless more.

cards.name: Lucky Helmet
text: Whenever the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Lysandre
text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Paint Roller
text: Discard any Stadium card in play. Then, draw a card.

cards.name: Flash Energy
text: This card can only be attached to Lightning Pokémon. This card provides Lightning Energy only while this card is attached to a Lightning Pokémon. The Lightning Pokémon this card is attached to has no Weakness. (If this card is attached to anything other than a Lightning Pokémon, discard this card.)

attacks.name: Sleep Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Unseen Claw
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 70 more damage.

cards.name: Sceptile-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Thunder Rod
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and attach as many Lightning Energy cards you find there as you like to this Pokémon. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Sparkling Tail
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Ampharos-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Exavolt
attacks.text: You may do 50 more damage and leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed. If you do, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: Tyranitar-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Gaia Volcano
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 100 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

cards.name: Primal Groudon-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes this Pokémon, heal all damage from it.

cards.name: Trainers' Mail
text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Trainer card you find there (except for Trainers' Mail) and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Jagged Saber
attacks.text: You may attach up to 2 Grass Energy cards from your hand to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal all damage from that Pokémon.

cards.name: M Sceptile-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Act Tough
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 more damage.

cards.name: Ampharos Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Ampharos-EX.

cards.name: Faded Town
text: At any time between turns, put 2 damage counters on each Mega Evolution Pokémon.

attacks.name: Smash Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Hex Maniac
text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)

cards.name: Eco Arm
text: Shuffle 3 Pokémon Tool cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Steven
text: Search your deck for a Supporter card and a basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Resistance Blizzard
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by Pokémon-EX.

cards.name: Hex Maniac
text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)

attacks.name: Epic Splash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Tyranitar Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Tyranitar-EX.

attacks.name: Intelligence Gathering
attacks.text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Bee Revenge
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Burning Scales
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Wind Wheel
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Volcarona
text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Dangerous Energy
text: This card can only be attached to Darkness Pokémon. This card provides Darkness Energy only while this card is attached to a Darkness Pokémon. Whenever the Darkness Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon-EX (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon-EX. (If this card is attached to anything other than a Darkness Pokémon, discard this card.)

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Windmill
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flower Tornado
attacks.text: Move as many Grass Energy attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Poisonous Nest
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. Both Active Pokémon (except for Grass Pokémon) are now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Impound
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Tail

attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

cards.name: Baltoy
text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Double Type
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is in play, it is Psychic and Fighting type.
